name: Thomas Had Enough
description:
Thomas Had Enough is a rogue-lite game inspired by Thomas Was Alone's artstyle where the player needs to fight his way to the end of different levels.

Game submission to Brackeys Game Jam 9. (Theme: An end is a new beginning*)

Source code: https://github.com/Thev2Andy/ThomasHadEnough

If the game appears blurry / low-resolution and doesn't take input, try playing it in fullscreen. (It should resolve the issue when getting out of fullscreen for that session too. Blame unity not me.)

Controls:

A, D - Move.

W / Space - Jump.

E - Pick up.

LMB - Shoot.
